summary: This bill, the Combating Illicit Xylazine Act, aims to regulate the substance xylazine. It defines xylazine, adds it to Schedule III of the Controlled Substances Act, and clarifies the definition of "ultimate user" for xylazine, limiting its use to veterinary or government programs. The bill also addresses manufacturer requirements, labeling, practitioner registration, and requires reports to Congress on xylazine's illicit use and its impact and calls for the Sentencing Commission to review sentencing guidelines for xylazine-related offenses.
